### Overview

This course introduces scRNAseq analysis in Bioconductor and beyond.

The course consists of a single session. Exercises and answer sheets are included after all subsections to practice techniques and provide examples.

Course material and exercises are available to view as rendered HTML at https://rockefelleruniversity.github.io/scRNA-seq/.
All material is available to download under GPL v2 license.
